self is explicitly positional-only to allow self as a field name.

class tavo.client.TavoConfig(*, api_key: str | None = None, jwt_token: str | None = None, session_token: str | None = None, base_url: str = 'https://api.tavoai.net', api_version: str = 'v1', timeout: float = 30.0, max_retries: int = 3, websocket_config: ~tavo.client.WebSocketConfig = <factory>)[source]

class tavo.client.TavoClient(api_key: str | None = None, jwt_token: str | None = None, session_token: str | None = None, base_url: str = 'https://api.tavoai.net', api_version: str = 'v1', timeout: float = 30.0, max_retries: int = 3)[source]

Bases: object

Main client for interacting with Tavo AI API

Initialize Tavo API client

Parameters:

  • api_key – API key for authentication. If not provided, will look for TAVO_API_KEY env var

  • jwt_token – JWT token for authentication

  • session_token – Session token for authentication

  • base_url – Base URL for the API

  • api_version – API version to use

  • timeout – Request timeout in seconds

  • max_retries – Maximum number of retries for failed requests

Connect to scan progress updates WebSocket

  • scan_id – The scan ID to monitor

  • on_message – Callback function for handling scan update messages

Send a message through a WebSocket connection

Parameters:

  • connection_id – The connection ID to send through

  • message – The message to send

Returns:

True if sent successfully, False otherwise

Module contents

Tavo AI Python SDK

class tavo.TavoClient(api_key: str | None = None, jwt_token: str | None = None, session_token: str | None = None, base_url: str = 'https://api.tavoai.net', api_version: str = 'v1', timeout: float = 30.0, max_retries: int = 3)[source]

Bases: object

Main client for interacting with Tavo AI API

Initialize Tavo API client

Parameters:

  • api_key – API key for authentication. If not provided, will look for TAVO_API_KEY env var

  • jwt_token – JWT token for authentication

  • session_token – Session token for authentication

  • base_url – Base URL for the API

  • api_version – API version to use

  • timeout – Request timeout in seconds

  • max_retries – Maximum number of retries for failed requests
